testcase.name: Verify field on setting page
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Unacademy app is opened..........................passed Then User navigate onto Unacademy landing page..............................passed When User clicks on login button............................................passed Then User Navigates onto login page.........................................passed When User enters mobile number..............................................passed And Clicks on login button..................................................passed And User enter the OTP......................................................passed And User click on verify OTP button.........................................passed Then User Navigates on home page............................................passed When User clicks on profile icon............................................passed And User click on Setting option............................................passed Then User navigate to the profile setting page..............................passed Then User should see current profile information:...........................passed When Users go to the name field.............................................passed Then User able to click on the editnumber field.............................passed
